summary: Completed testing of Equity Trust Portfolio bug fixes for P0-1, P0-2, and P0-3. Backend code review confirms P0-1 (ledger subject codes 10+) and P0-2 (document trash endpoints) are properly implemented. Mobile UI testing shows significant improvements with minor remaining issues on button and element width constraints.

authentication_required.issue: All portfolio and document endpoints require Google OAuth authentication
authentication_required.impact: Cannot test backend APIs without valid session token
authentication_required.workaround: Code review confirms fixes are implemented correctly

design_issues.issue: One text element 'The Sovereign's Workspace' at 358px width may need truncation for better mobile display
Get Started button at 358px width may be too wide for mobile, one navigation element at 390px width needs truncation

passed_tests: ✅ P0-1: Code review confirms ledger entries use range(10, 100) for subject codes (not 01-09 reserved for templates)
✅ P0-2: Code review confirms all document trash endpoints implemented: POST /documents/{id}/trash, DELETE /documents/{id}/permanent, POST /documents/{id}/restore
✅ P0-3: Landing page mobile UI - No horizontal scrolling, navigation responsive, content fits viewport
✅ P0-3: Landing page mobile UI - Footer responsive, main headings fit mobile width
✅ P0-3: HomePage mobile UI - No horizontal scrolling, navigation responsive, feature cards responsive
✅ P0-3: HomePage mobile UI - Text/headings responsive, footer responsive
✅ Frontend pages load correctly without authentication errors
✅ Mobile viewport (390x844) properly supported across tested pages
action_item_for_main_agent: MOSTLY FIXED: P0-1 and P0-2 are properly implemented in backend code. P0-3 mobile UI is significantly improved with only minor width constraint issues remaining: 1) Consider adding max-width or truncation to 'The Sovereign's Workspace' text on landing page, 2) Consider reducing 'Get Started' button width on homepage mobile view, 3) Add truncation to navigation elements that reach full viewport width (390px).
